entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
